name: Block Block
description:
This game supports 2-4 people.

4 people can play together on one keyboard.

Key position:

Player 1:

[ A, D ] - Move

[ W ] - Jump

[ S ] - Grenade

[ Z ] - Join The Game

Player 2:

[ G, J ] - Move

[ Y ] - Jump

[ H ] - Grenade

[ B ] - Join The Game

Player 3:

[ Leftward Arrow, Rightward Arrow ] - Move

[ Upward Arrow ] - Jump

[ Downward Arrow ] - Grenade

[ / (Slash) ] - Join The Game

Player 4:

[ Keypad /, Keypad - ] - Move

[ Keypad INSERT ] - Jump

[ Keypad * ] - Grenade

[ keypad + ] - Join The Ga

Game Rules:

- Penalty points for touching the thorns.

- Eat gold coins to score.

- The higher the score, the more points will be deducted.

- After playing 3 rounds of random levels, the game is over.

- Each round will tell you whether you can use the grenade.
